concept.title: Updating replicas for a pod type (StatefulSet)

conbody.p: StatefulSet is a Kubernetes workload API object. It manages the deployment and scaling of a set of pods. In SPS the number of replicas can be updated only for the Aerospike StatefulSets.
Use helm upgrade command to update the number of replicas in a StatefulSet in SPS.
For more information about StatefulSet, see Kubernetes documentation.
